LanguageData.Enby.EnbyChance: Chance of a person being non-binary:
LanguageData.Enby.GenderNeutralNamesTooltip: Choose how gender neutral names will be used for non-binary people
LanguageData.Enby.GenderNeutralNameOptionTooltipNoneB: Do not use gender neutral names
LanguageData.Enby.GenderNeutralNameOptionTooltipNoneV: . Non-binary people will be given a male or female first name.
LanguageData.Enby.GenderNeutralNameOptionTooltipAddBr: Add gender neutral names to existing names
LanguageData.Enby.GenderNeutralNameOptionTooltipAddVe: . Non-binary people will be given a male, female, or gender neutral name.
